Proud to stand with this group. If we all can't go then none of us will go. #VWFC #NoBanNoWall https://t.co/N6j5k5ITol
@LindsideOut @SpicyTunaRo @Rad_Nikki_17 how much is this one? Worth it?
@thimblewad right! I just meant they deserve us all crapping on them until it's down.
@draytonvanas alternatively, "Canada bans Trump supporters. Just temporarily, until we figure things out."
@draytonvanas I wouldn't have minded that if their reply was *SUSPECT IS A WHITE NATIONAL TERRORIST* but it wasn't.
Pretty pathetic that our Prime Minister's office has to waste time trying to get Fox News to report accurately. Takâ€¦ https://t.co/LAfMzaF2qp

@thimblewad damn. That makes me proud.
@donnamatrix he has two. The @PressSec one is more formal, that one was his personal one.

@anguswalker could. But we've known there was a bit of animosity between those two since before Pedro left.

@richardfarley HOW is this unpopular? That'd be great.
@ariellec I'm here. I got you boo. https://t.co/JEoexFlZAK
@AidanRantoul agree. But having a divided squad was, IMO, an issue last year and we don't need a former player breeding resentment.
@AidanRantoul honestly now I'm annoyed. To think that Pedro could be breeding this feeling of resent with our current players. gtfo
@AidanRantoul feels so petty that after leaving the club he still holds that grudge.
@AnAbnos first it's cats, but what's next? People in the Westminster Dog Show?
@KyleBraun sometimes you have to have the courage to be different.
@MikeMartignago stick to..wait, what do you even tweet about these days?
@JavyMaltes swears are bad, meaniehead.
So Bola had a live video on Instagram this morning. You'll never guess who commented "kick the keeper in the butt fâ€¦ https://t.co/LAyfNcJB8g
@Subhedgehog @Lord_Bob I singled you out but many other caps fans felt the same as you.
@Lord_Bob hey @Subhedgehog wanna chime in on this? Everyone knows apparently?
@TravisLuscombe are you sure you aren't a Whitecaps fan? You sound like a Whitecaps fan.
@Lord_Bob yeah, Whitecaps fans didn't totally hate him for that while he played for us. Bang on Bobbo. ðŸ™„
@TravisLuscombe hah! He wasn't loved by many up here, but I loved him like a cheeky uncle.
Blas is officially gone. ðŸ˜ž #VWFC https://t.co/c2GnuCVmRY
@donnamatrix totally forgot about the intro, THAT's the best bet! haha After that it's the sale punch passes.
@donnamatrix not sure anyone is!? They do have sales on their punch passes I think (by email), those are your best bet for drop in.
@donnamatrix Ouch. I'm near Comm Dr and I genuinely miss them. There's yoga close but yyoga's just so reliable with massive class schedules.
@donnamatrix oh then start anywhere! I thought maybe you were new to yoga and I find Hatha to be a good starting point.
@donnamatrix it's great, sad I'm not close anymore. Did DT, Yaletown, Kits. Have done all classes, would start with Hatha and go from there.
@donnamatrix I have in the past for years, what's up?
@loxyisme @dzuunmod as I mentioned before, BF would love to visit Yukon in general. Aurora would be icing on the cake for me to see.
@dzuunmod @loxyisme uh, drinkin' beers, giving Lubo candles, the schedule will be VERY full Josh.
@loxyisme when does aurora end? The $ I'm definitely not spending the states could maybe go to Yukon if this AirNorth deal is on!
@GlassCityFC even if you aren't really into rugby it's a great doc.

@jbuf1 I appreciate what you do. But I must admit I do find this a bit tasteless.
@GKnutsonCTV their biggest fan, @Lord_Bob

@CapsOffside let go from Bell Media along with Scott Rintoul.
@PeteSchaad horrible news, thanks for everything you did. Time to get the @footysoldiers band together again?

@risingaction UGH. This is awful.
@_LaineyBoggs_ hopefully a lot of snacks. The only reason these would be acceptable and even then, barely.
@GlassCityFC @thegoalkeeper Base soccer.
@Lord_Bob @aftncanada overreaction of the century Bobbo. He had a sumo manbun AND silver hair. gtfo.

@Lord_Bob stick 2 curling.

@SteveDavis90 first 7 layer dip and now this? Let the people live.
@JosieBeckerFC as a Canadian it's just how it is. I feel weird not apologizing about certain things.
@MattBInYYC no one said you can't go. How many are boycotting and should busses be planned like before were the questions.
